basics.name: Wojciech Ossowski
basics.label: Senior Node.js Developer
basics.summary:
Goal-oriented, agile, pragmatic Full Stack Software Developer.
I believe that well understanding of Business Domain and close cooperation with Domain Experts combined with choosing right technologies to certain solution leads to Software Success.
Currently I'm working as a Senior Software Engineer at Autronica Fire & Security A.S. (a Carrier Corp. Business Unit)

work.company: Autronica Fire & Security A.S. (a Carrier Corp. Business Unit)
work.summary: Full Stack Software Development - Backend, Web & Mobile
highlights: Design and implementation of Event-driven fire detection and monitoring cloud solution
Implementation Service-oriented architecture - achieved with hexagonal architecture and DDD consumed by Web (2), gRPC(1) and Mobile(2) clients - Written in TS, hosted on AWS over Kubernetes
Development of Mobile and Tablet clients with React Native used for Comissioning and Monitoring of Fire Alarm Systems
Implementation of Single-page Web applications with React - Customer Dashboard and Admin Panel
Implementation of Proxy Client (CloudConnector) for 3rd party and legacy systems to communicate with Cloud over gRPC
Building CI/CD pipelines for mobile applications with distribution over AppStore and Google Play
Methodologies: Domain-Driven Design, Test Driven Development, Event Storming, Event Sourcing, CQRS
Core technologies: Node.js, Typescript, ES6, PostgreSQL, Redis, Socket.io, AWS, React, React Native, REST, gRPC, Docker, Kubernetes, Nats, Linkerd
Implementation of chatbot - Slack-based business processes automation tool
Integrating chatbot with external data sources - Jira, Salesforce, GoogleSheets, etc
Dealing with CI/CD processes on destination environment
Fulfilling client’s & stakeholders' requrements
Preparing estimations
Introducing new team members
Mentoring
Technologies: Node.js, es6, Hubot, Heroku, GoogleCloudPlatform, Googleapis, circleCI

work.company: Autronica Fire & Security A.S. (an United Technologies Business Unit)
highlights: Working in Agile environment
Implementation of key features in flagship product - AutroMaster (both client and Server side)
Involved in many projects - AutroSafe, AutroPrime, AutroSim
Development of tools used in fire detection industry
Fire panels and Monitoring system integration, dealing with gas/fire/smoke detectors with various configurations
Working closely to embedded systems (configuration built on both simulation and physical environment)
Sustaining
Core technologies: Node.js, C++11/14, Qt, QML, Angular
Fulfilling client’s requrements
Implementing key features
Preparing estimations
Development of video editing tool for Windows/OSX (pledged on KickStarter)
Development of encrypted white-labeled communicator for Linux/Android/BlackBerry/Yolla
Bugfixing
Refactoring
Technologies: C++11/14, Qt, QML

work.summary: Care and maintenance of flagship risk management software - Kondor+
highlights: HighDpi integration of User Interface
Bugfixing
Technologies: C++, Qt, Sybase ASE

work.company: SFAR S.C. (now Global Control 5 sp. z o.o.)
work.summary: Used to create configuration software and web services
highlights: Implemention of new functionalities of configuration software (C#)
Mobile application development for devices - pledged on KickStarter (Qt)
Creating maintenance applications for line of devices (USB-hid, Modbus)
Embedded-hosted configuration web services for Automation devices (Web/VanillaJS)
Embedded Linux development (Python/Shell scripts)
Bugfixing
Technologies: C#, C++/Qt, Web/JavaScript

work.summary: Middleware application developer. Used to create configuration software in C++/Qt
highlights: Creation and deployment of middleware bridge-sever between configuration software and hardware
Implementing new functionalities of configuration software
Writing and executing tests
Bugfixing
Technologies: C++/Qt

references.name: Łukasz Pieczkowski (Project Manager at United Technologies Fire & Security)
references.reference: Wojtek proved to be very talented and skilled developer. I enjoyed working with him and would recommend him as a developer with no hesitation.

references.name: Tomasz Stelmach (R&D Manager at United Technologies Fire & Security)
references.reference: I have no hesitation in recommending Wojciech to any organization or confirmation to references.

references.name: Wieslaw Irzyniec (Test Engineer at Carrier Corporation)
references.reference: He has a remarkable combination of programming skills, ability to explain complex problems in an understandable way and interdisciplinary knowledge. Both highly skilled and humble at the same time. Personally I believe he is also a very motivating and fun person to work with.
